issue.title: Ignition simulator lags behind rostopic outputs

content.raw:
This is the path I’ve been flying were I can consistently reproduce the lag.

The lag is noticeable for me after 3 min sim time, 8 min real time. By the time I got back to the entrance I timed the lag as 75 seconds in real time which was after 5 min sim time and 18 min real time.

The sim window does occasionally jump forward like it’s trying to catch up.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1565053556-ign_delay_4.png)
content.html:
This is the path I’ve been flying were I can consistently reproduce the lag.

The lag is noticeable for me after 3 min sim time, 8 min real time. By the time I got back to the entrance I timed the lag as 75 seconds in real time which was after 5 min sim time and 18 min real time.

The sim window does occasionally jump forward like it’s trying to catch up.
